knitting pattern bear ears hat chunky animal winter toque thick warm wool ease thick and quick newborn baby toddler child

after many requests, our popular bear ears knitting pattern is now available!
this makes the perfect pregnancy announcement, baby shower gift, newborn photography prop or winter hat for your little one. you are welcome to make hats made from this pattern to resell on etsy or elsewhere. credit for the pattern by linking back to my shop is greatly appreciated.

sizes: newborn, 0-3 months, 3-6 months, 6-12 months, 1-3 years, 4-12 years.

yarn: lion brand - wool ease thick & quick.

the pattern includes detailed directions and photographs showing the steps to make the ears.

check out our brand new stitch stoppers in our shop! www.foxandpinestitches.com
